markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Anadi Lurker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1607)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These anadis lurkers combine their innate magical talents and wilderness lore to snare prey. 

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Anadi_Lurker.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Anadi Lurker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1607)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 78

**Perception** +11

**Languages**
[Anadi](/Languages.aspx?ID=46), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +5, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +0

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +9 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 45

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +12 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+3 piercing plus anadi venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
kukri +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 20
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Color Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=44), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [Illusory Object](/Spells.aspx?ID=160)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28), [Web](/Spells.aspx?ID=374)

**Anadi Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 18 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 4 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d6 poison damage and [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage, flat-footed, and [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) (1 round)

**Change Shape** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) The anadi changes into their hybrid, spider, or human form. The above statistics assume the anadi is in hybrid form. While in human form, the anadi seeker loses their climb Speed and can't use their fangs attack. When in spider form, they can't use weapons.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The anadi lurker deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Spin Silk**  ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Exploration](/Traits.aspx?ID=66), [Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) By spending several minutes, an anadi can produce silk to craft items made of cloth. An anadi can produce enough silk in a day to craft a single garment.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-107" />
name: Anadi Lurker

Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 20 Unspecific Lore : DC 18 Specific Lore : DC 15 Anadi Lurker Source Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic pg. 78 Perception +11 Languages Anadi, Common Skills Acrobatics +9, Athletics +10, Crafting +5, Nature +7, Stealth +11, Survival +9 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +0 Int +0 Wis +2 Cha +1 Items Kukri, Leather Armor --- AC 19 Fort +7 Ref +11 Will +9 HP 45 --- Speed 25 feet, climb 25 feet Melee Single Action fangs +12 (Finesse), Damage 1d8+3 piercing plus anadi venom Melee Single Action kukri +12 (Agile, Finesse, Trip), Damage 1d6+3 slashing Arcane Innate Spells DC 20 - Cantrips (2nd) Daze, Detect Magic, Mage Hand, Message - 1st Color Spray, Illusory Disguise, Illusory Object - 2nd Blur, Web Anadi Venom (Poison) Saving Throw DC 18 Fortitude; Maximum Duration 4 rounds; Stage 1 1d6 poison damage and flat-footed (1 round); Stage 2 1d6 poison damage, flat-footed, and clumsy 1 (1 round) Change Shape Single Action (Arcane, Concentrate, Polymorph, Transmutation) The anadi changes into their hybrid, spider, or human form. The above statistics assume the anadi is in hybrid form. While in human form, the anadi seeker loses their climb Speed and can't use their fangs attack. When in spider form, they can't use weapons. Sneak Attack The anadi lurker deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures. Spin Silk (Concentrate, Exploration, Manipulate) By spending several minutes, an anadi can produce silk to craft items made of cloth. An anadi can produce enough silk in a day to craft a single garment.
